alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Gilchrist (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 17 at 1:40AM EST until January 17 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. * WHERE...Gilchrist and Coastal Nassau Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from this evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.
